omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.ArrivalDate,
		ae.ArrivalTime
from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
	inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
		on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
where ae.NHSNumber is not null
and d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis in ('20','201')

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.name: observation_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: ArrivalTime
dataSource.description: The time (using a 24 hour clock) that is of relevance to an ACTIVITY.

origins.origin: ARRIVAL TIME AT ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis
dataSource.description:
ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY DIAGNOSIS is a six character code, comprising:
					Diagnosis Condition	n2
					Sub-Analysis	n1
					ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL AREA	n2
					ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL SIDE

omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.ArrivalDate,
		ae.ArrivalTime
from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
	inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
		on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
where ae.NHSNumber is not null
and d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis in ('20','201')
